text: The ABC Wasp is a Piston aircraft engine.British ABC Wasp It's made in the UK By ABC Motors. The first engine was made in 1916 and there where 56 engines made. == Variants == *Wasp I *Wasp II == Users == ; Wasp I * Avro 504K * BAT Bantam * BAT Baboon * Sopwith Snail * Westland Wagtail ; Wasp II * Avro 504K * BAT Bantam * Saunders Kittiwake * Sopwith Snail * Westland Wagtail == References == Category:ABC aircraft engines
title: ABC Wasp
